description:
The return of some familiar faces breathes new life into Earth`s resistance, but they`re as troublesome as they`ve always been! And when the Liberation Army brings out its big guns, it`s up to Gengai to respond.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Geezers Carve the Things They Shouldn`t Forget into Their Wrinkles
Jiisan wa Wasurete wa Ikenai Mono o Shiwa ni Kizamu
Le papy plisse de rides ce qu`il ne doit pas oublier
爺さんは忘れてはいけないものを皺に刻む
